param.name: args.eclipsehelp.toc
param.desc: Specifies the name of the TOC file.

param.name: args.eclipsehelp.country
param.desc: Specifies the region for the language that is specified by the args.

param.name: args.eclipsehelp.language
param.desc: Specifies the base language for translated content, such as en for English.

param.name: args.eclipse.provider
param.desc: Specifies the name of the person or organization that provides the Eclipse help.

param.name: args.eclipse.version
param.desc: Specifies the version number to include in the output.

param.name: args.eclipse.symbolic.name
param.desc: Specifies the symbolic name (aka plugin ID) in the output for an Eclipse Help project.
